intent_atoms.description: Expose structured parsing for tfhd so fragment run metadata includes track defaults across Kit, CLI, and JSON export surfaces.
Call sites updated: CLI EventConsoleFormatter, JSON exporter snapshot fixture
Backward compatibility: additive parsing and formatting; existing fields remain intact

functional_units.name: ParsedBoxPayload.Detail.trackFragmentHeader

functional_units.description: Represents the parsed track fragment header box data structure

functional_units.description: Registers and parses movie fragment boxes, including tfhd parsing

functional_units.name: JSONParseTreeExporter
functional_units.description: Exports parsed box payloads to JSON format, including track fragment header details

functional_units.name: EventConsoleFormatter
functional_units.description: Formats event console output for CLI, incorporating track fragment header information
